proposal: Diving into the spirit of the 2024 Paris Olympic Games, OGP Inu is already on the podium for bringing decentralization to the forefront of global celebrations. With 271 holders cheering on the ETH network, why not amplify this energy? Imagine deploying your own DEX or hosting a community lottery, sharing the victory with every participant. Let's bring the Olympic torch into the digital age together, shall we?
